text: Otmar Gutmann (April 24, 1927 in Münstertal - October 13, 1993 in Russikon) was a German television producer, animator and director. He is best known for making the cartoon Pingu. Category:1937 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Animators Category:German entertainers Category:People from Baden- Württemberg Category:German television directors Category:Television producers
title: Otmar Gutmann
